objects.text: • Spacious Design • Premium Faux Leather • Gold Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant banner design is crafted to promote a stylish luxury handbag. It features a high-impact central product image layered over a soft circular cream frame, enhancing visual focus. The background uses a radial gradient that transitions from light tan to deep brown, giving a rich, warm feel. Text elements include a bold, all-caps headline (`heading`) for impactful branding, followed by a serif subheading (`subheading`) to describe the product stylishly. The price (`price`) is prominently placed inside a golden-yellow circular badge, making it instantly noticeable. Supporting text (`description`) outlines key features in a soft white font. A contrasting gold button (`cta_background`) with a black CTA label (`cta`) anchors the layout effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Tan (#D2B48C)
- Saddle Brown (#8B5A2B)
- Cream White (#FFF5E1)
- Gold (#FFD700)
- Goldenrod (#D4AF37)
- Black (#000000)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag with a warm taupe-brown leather base (#A9746E) that conveys elegance and versatility. The textured leather subtly interacts with light, adding depth while keeping the focus on the handbag’s structure. Accents of polished metallic gold (#D4AF37) are utilized in the hardware, logo, and decorative charms, highlighting luxury and sophistication. These gold elements contrast beautifully against the matte leather, making the product look premium. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette of taupe (#A9746E), cream (#F5F5DC), gold (#D4AF37), and muted blush pink (#E7C8C0) will reflect the product’s refined aesthetic while maintaining visual harmony.
